metadata.name: Cursed Night
metadata.description: A horrible night to have a curse.

writes.comment: Open Demon's secret door at reverse castle
Force Red Rust at Entrance (Bone Scimitar 2)
Subweapon Special System (Boss Room check function)
Heart max gain on Lv Up
Outer wall elevator can be used when cursed
